text: (mesema) madyanvasinda, (tamange nabivarayava borukaraya kalaha. mesema) musavada (tama janatava visin) borukaraya bavata pat karanu læbuveya. ebævin pratiksepa kala movun siyallantama ma sulu kala avakasayak laba di, pasuva ovunva ma alla gattemi. (mage) danduvame (bhayanakabhavaya) kese tibunedæyi (yanna oba avadhanaya kara bæluvehida)
